text: The men's 1500 metres event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 13 and 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Abdalaati Iguider ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Benson Esho ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Brimin Kipruto ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
